Every subsequent build fails, even if I re-create the plugin.xml file.

PDE was deactivated before you deleted plugin.xml for some other reason. 

There was an issue of PDE being deactivated as a result of failing to load 
JavaCore plug-in during build (non-UI thread).

This problem has been recently fixed, and the chance that PDE will be 
deactivated will be that much smaller.
